CustomField.description: To show Phone Number in single format
CustomField.formula: IF(tdc_tsw__Phone_Number__c <> Null || tdc_tsw__Phone_Number__c <> "", SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE(tdc_tsw__Phone_Number__c, " ", ""),"(","" ), ")",""),"-",""),"_",""),".",""),"+",""),",",""),"/",""),"")
CustomField.label: Phone Number
